attributes.action: Non of the above option on ballot papers
attributes.additional_details:
Are you dissalusioned with politics but would like the opportunity to express this by voting positively?
The inclusion of a non of the above option on all ballot papers would enable people to express their dissatisfaction with the status quo without either voting for a party of protest, spoiling the ballot paper or not voting at all.
Give people the chance to show that a low turn out does not equal apathy.

rejection.details:
Please see petition below:

Petition Title: Include No Confidence vote on ballot papers

Created by: Chris Richards

Closing: 01/11/2014
